_header: Out of the east a star shone bright
_description: An Epiphany carol — eight quatrains (aaab) plus burden (bb): ‘Be mery all þat be present / Omnes de saba venient’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Owt of þe est a sterre shon brightffor to shew thre kyngis
                    light…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& ever to God lett vs prayThat on the rode was
                    rentExplicit
OxfBal354.Note:
Note following explicit: ‘Est tuus Anna pater Izacar Nasaphat
                        tua mater’ (p. 352).
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
